page.title: 02Marisco Jun.Football Club.
page.content: The Marisco Juniors is a Football Club that plays in Sutton.{Mr Coote}coaches them.It is split into 2 groups They are the under 12's and under 14's.The best players in the U12's are{John {Hamilton}and{John Moffatt,}the U14's are{Mark Payne}and{Tony Parkin.}Last year the team went to America and this year they are going to Denmark.The team is made up of from along the east coast of Lincolnshire - Sutton and {Mablethorpe,Skegness}and{Chapel St {Leonard's.}It is calle "Marisco" because the area used to be called that.They have won 5 cups.They are the U12 league twice,the Steve Wright Trophy twice and the George Briggs semi final challenge.{Mr Coote}knows {Tony Galvin}who plays for Spurs.He started coaching 10 years ago and he has won 10 cups.The most goals the team has won by is 14.
